story_26_08000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Phew! I didn’t expect this training session to turn 
into an all-nighter!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But we trained so much, you should be ready for
anything now. Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_26_08000/2401_0401_0400_10:
Of course you are! How could you not be after
training with ME all night?
story_26_08000/2401_0402_0600_10:
Don’t go all weak on me now! You’ll be fine!
You’re strong.
story_26_08000/2401_1001_0700_10: Of course, you still don’t hold a candle to me!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Anyway, time for me to go. I have my own match
to win.
story_26_08000/2401_1001_2500_10: Heh, guess my teammate came to pick me up.
story_26_08000/2401_1001_2800_10: Hey, that’s not what you said when I showed up!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Oh well. I guess you’re just the kinda guy who
stands out, even when you don’t say a thing.
story_26_08000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Heh, so [Name:PlayerNickname ] caught your
eye, too, huh?
story_26_08000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Cynthia’s strong, but you guys aren’t too
shabby yourselves!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_1200_10: I expect to battle you again soon!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_1300_10: Blue actually makes a pretty good mentor!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_1400_10: Yup! Thanks to him, we got a lot of training done!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_1500_10:
After all this training, maybe we’ll put up a good
fight against Cynthia today...
story_26_08000/2401_1001_1600_10:
No, you know what? We’re gonna win our
match today!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_3300_10:
We have to keep winning if we want a battle
with Red and Blue!
story_26_08000/2401_1001_1800_10:
It’s time for your quarterfinals match with Cynthia
and her team!
story_26_08000/2401_0401_2100_10:
Ganbatte! Go for it! Everyone is hoping for
your victory!
story_26_08000/2401_0402_2300_10:
Ganbatte! Go for it! Everyone is hoping for
your victory!
